startmsg: Wellcome to EBG_Weather Bot This bot can send you a weather forcase of your current location or you can set it up in a group to provide you daily with the weather of today. This Bot supports multiple languages and has a easy to use UI
helpmsg:
/start - Displays start message
/help - Displays help message
/setup - Setup for groups

Inline.NoGPSAndQuery: Please provide a location or allow GPS usage
